select group_id groupId,master_order_sn masterOrderSn from master_order_info_extend where master_order_sn in
#{item}

select moie.master_order_sn from master_order_info_extend moie inner join master_order_info moi on moie.master_order_sn=moi.master_order_sn where moi.order_status in (0,1) and moi.pay_status in (1,2,3) AND moie.group_id = #{groupId} limit 1
